text: The Man Who Quit Smoking () is a 1972 Swedish comedy movie directed by Tage Danielsson and starring Gösta Ekman, Grynet Molvig, Carl-Gustaf Lindstedt, Toivo Pawlo, Holger Löwenadler. == Other websites == * Category:1972 comedy movies Category:Swedish comedy movies Category:Movies about smoking Category:Movies directed by Tage Danielsson
title: The Man Who Quit Smoking
